content:
THe IG Publisher is giving me a new error that I have not seen before

Resource has provided narrative, but the narrative indicates that it is generated - remove the narrative or fix it up

None of my resource examples have a narrative. How do I stop the publisher from generating the narratives in its html versions of the examples?

I should also add that there is one example I have which the IG Publisher generates a narrative for but it is NOT reported as an error.

This may be a result of the fact I was running the wrong batch file.

How long does it take for a push to the git repo to show up on the build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/?
